text: Canada did 42,000 doses yesterday. Really hoping they can step it up. At this rate, it’d take almost 5 years to vaccinate all 37million of us.

elements.text: Canada did 42,000 doses yesterday. Really hoping they can step it up. At this rate, it’d take almost 5 years to vaccinate all 37million of us.

text:
If only it was this easy:
```julia> using Distributed

julia> @everywhere inject!(:arm, :mRNA_encoding_sars_cov2_spike_protein)

julia> ```
